page.title: 07MY SCHOOL
page.content: There are 44 children in my school.34 come from English homes,and 10 from Welsh homes,but we all speak Welsh.I like our school uniform-the tie has got light blue and dark blue diagonal lines,the shirt or blouse is white and the sweater is V-necked,light blue with the school badge in dark blue on it.The badge is a silouette of the red kite,with the words"YSGOL SWYDDFFYNNON" encircling it.We have 3 teachers,and are split into groups of 16 with Mr. Jones,15 with Mrs. Rose and 13 with Mrs. Williams.We have plenty of variety in our lessons-Maths,Welsh,English,Computer, Games,Sewing,Craft,Singing,Television, and lots of projects.We are having an extension built because there is not enough room,and up to now we have only had outside toilets situated across the yard.They are horrible.
